attributes.action: ensure that all sides of the scientific dabate on global warming and its causes are included in the education curriculum as opposed to the current approach of only including the man made global warming case which is not yet conclusive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current situation is unnacceptable with the government, the media and the education authorities all preaching the man made global warming case as if it were a closed issue. This is clearly not the case, with many scientists dissagreeing and some very serious alternative theories being dissmissed as part of the "sceptic`s" "propaganda".
Whilst some reliance can be placed upon adults to distinguish between scientific truth and political propaganda, education should be limited to the teaching of known truths and the ability to distinguish between fact and what the authorities want us to believe. It is absolutely essential we do not permanently currupt the minds of the young with fashionable politics.
